函大.definition: correspondence university (abbr. for 函授大學|函授大学[han2shou4 da4xue2])

函谷關.definition: Hangu Pass in modern day Henan Province, strategic pass forming the eastern gate of the Qin State during the Warring States Period (770-221 BC)

函辦.definition: to bring to justice; to hand over to the law (abbr. for 函送法辦|函送法办[han2song4-fa3ban4])

函送.definition: (formal) to inform by letter; to submit in writing

函送法辦.definition: (idiom) to bring to justice; to hand over to the law

函館.definition: Hakodate, main port of south Hokkaidō 北海道[Bei3 hai3 dao4], Japan
